channel.title: [REQ]Chaotic Shields on PI client[20$]
channel.description:
I'm using a PI client and started with MTP v2 base, which has the ItemDef.java in it and has chaotic weapons. I know Chaotic Shields can be added because I've seen them before. And I know I can simply copy from another client BUT I'm lazy.
Please add me on MSN to further discuss this. DO NOT pm me telling me to add your MSN because I'm not going to. I'M LAZY.
foreverpkers@live.com Thanks! Jimmy
And whoever does this for me I'll like.. Love you forever and ask you to marry me. Thanks
(Doing this because many people have asked to donate for Chaotic Shields.)
